szayelaporro-granz.name: Szayelaporro Granz
szayelaporro-granz.quote: I am a perfect being! My body, mind, and powers are all perfect!
szayelaporro-granz.description: The Octava Espada and self-proclaimed 'perfect' Aspect of Madness. A twisted scientist obsessed with perfection who treats battle as an experiment, modifying his servants and opponents to be able to face any opponent while maintaining a facade of sophistication. As a Short Range fighter, he combines precise Melee combat with his unique and complex mechanics. After Awakening, Szayelaporro's Gambler playstyle comes into play as he makes full use of his 'Spiritual Pressure Understanding' Gauge, which is filled by advancing his 'Analysis Process' count through applying and retrieving 'Rokureichu' on his opponents. Each of the three stages of the 'Spiritual Pressure Understanding' Gauge supplies different buffs, with the random possibility to claim more Konpaku through his Kikon Moves, and even the possibility of activating his Reviver perk, rebirthing him with a small amount of Reishi and Konpaku. With exceptional Technique, moderate Speed and Range, but low Power and Defense, Szayelaporro excels at gradually dismantling opponents through careful analysis and tactical superiority. Most importantly, because of his Reviver capabilities, Szayelaporro starts with only 5 Konpaku, as opposed to the traditional 9 Konpaku.

base.name: Unique Mechanic: Analysis Process Counter
base.description: Szayelaporro has a Unique Mechanic where by using his Spiritual Pressure Move 1 `I Need Your Corpse Intact` and his Signature Move `Retrieve Rokureichu`, his Analysis Process Counter increases. The Analysis Process Counter begins at 0, and has a maximum value of 100. When the Analysis Process Counter hits 100, it resets back to 0, and levels up the Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge by one Level (To a maximum Level of Level 3), tilting the RNG aspects of Szayelaporro's Awakening towards his favour with each Level gained.

base.name: Unique Mechanic: Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge
base.description: Szayelaporro has a Unique Mechanic where his Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge fills as his Analysis Process Counter hits 100. The Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge has three Levels, with each enhancing the RNG aspects of Szayelaporro's Awakening. As the Spritual Pressure Understanding Gauge increases, and when Szayelaporro is in Awakening, the number of Konpaku his Kikon Moves claim, the chance of him reviving after death, and the amount that his Analysis Process Counter increases by when claiming Rokureichu is all subject to the current 'weight' of the RNG affected by the Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge Level.

base.name: Retrieve Rokureichu
base.description: Szayelaporro grabs the opponent, retrieving any planted Rokureichu and increasing his Analysis Progress Counter.

base.name: I Need Your Corpse Intact
base.description: Szayelaporro fakes taking a hit and teleports behind the opponent, planting a Rokureichu inside the opponent and dealing damage.

base.name: You've Already Been Analysed!
base.description: Szayelaporro takes a stance and charges his Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge. The amount that is charged is dependent on his Analysis Progress Counter.

awakened.name: Unique Mechanic: Analysis Process Counter
awakened.description: Szayelaporro has a Unique Mechanic where by using his Spiritual Pressure Move 1 `I Need Your Corpse Intact` and his Signature Move `Retrieve Rokureichu`, his Analysis Process Counter increases. The Analysis Process Counter begins at 0, and has a maximum value of 100. When the Analysis Process Counter hits 100, it resets back to 0, and levels up the Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge by one Level (To a maximum Level of Level 3), tilting the RNG aspects of Szayelaporro's Awakening towards his favour with each Level gained.

awakened.name: Unique Mechanic: Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge
awakened.description: Szayelaporro has a Unique Mechanic where his Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge fills as his Analysis Process Counter hits 100. The Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge has three Levels, with each enhancing the RNG aspects of Szayelaporro's Awakening. As the Spritual Pressure Understanding Gauge increases, and when Szayelaporro is in Awakening, the number of Konpaku his Kikon Moves claim, the chance of him reviving after death, and the amount that his Analysis Process Counter increases by when claiming Rokureichu is all subject to the current 'weight' of the RNG affected by the Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge Level.

awakened.name: Ressurección: `Fornicarás (La Lujuriosa)` Awakening
awakened.description: Szayelaporro swallows his blade provocatively, erupting into a pink light before revealing his new, perfect form. After Awakening, Szayelaporro's stats are increased, and Szayelaporro's Gambler mechanics kick in. The number of Konpaku taken by Szayelaporro's Kikon Moves will vary depending on randomness, being weighed by the level of his `Spiritual Pressure Analysis Gauge`. Additionally, when Szayelaporro reaches 0 Konpaku, he is able to revive once with 3 additional Konpaku, depending on RNG. Finally, the amount that his `Analysis Process Counter` increases by will vary according to RNG.

awakened.name: Retrieve Rokureichu
awakened.description: Szayelaporro grabs the opponent, retrieving any planted Rokureichu and increasing his Analysis Progress Counter.

awakened.name: I Need Your Corpse Intact
awakened.description: Szayelaporro fakes taking a hit and teleports behind the opponent, planting a Rokureichu inside the opponent and dealing damage.

awakened.name: You've Already Been Analysed!
awakened.description: Szayelaporro takes a stance and charges his Spiritual Pressure Understanding Gauge. The amount that is charged is dependent on his Analysis Progress Counter.

tier-harribel.name: Tier Harribel
tier-harribel.quote: I don't want to become stronger through the power I gain by killing and sacrificing another. If I can't win alone, then I'll win as a group.
tier-harribel.description: The current Tres Espada and the Aspect of Sacrifice; Tier is a Rushdown Hybrid Range Melee character that utilises her unique Aura Gauge in order to boost her offensive capabilities; hitting enemies with attacks builds her Aura Gauge, and failing to land attacks after a short period of time decreases the Aura Gauge - Utilising her extreme combo potential and constantly beating her opponents down, Tier makes the most of her Gauge by never giving her opponent an inch. If the opponent gains distance, using Tier's Spiritual Pressure 1 Move, 'Ola Azul' will provide a good Poking option to keep her gauge up. After Awakening, Tier's range increases considerably, and further increases the buffs provided by her Aura Gauge.

base.name: Drift
base.description: Harribel charges towards her target at an immense speed; Harribel's Signature Move doesn't have any offensive capabilities, and is purely for movement, however it can lead to surprising opportunities for combos.

base.name: Ola Azul
base.description: A blast of Reiryoku that is concentrated in the gap between Tiburon's blade, setting it ablaze, which is fired out like a bullet towards Tier's opponent. Increases the Aura Gauge when it hits.

base.name: I'll Show You
base.description: A series of 3 slashes comprising of an uppercut, downslash and a wide slash from left to right. Increases the Aura Gauge when it hits.

awakened.name: Ressurección: `Tiburon` Awakening
awakened.description: Harribel holds Tiburon vertically as water swells around her, entombing her body; she emerges with a slash, losing her Hollow Mask and most of her clothes, as Tiburon transforms into a large fin-like blade. After Awakening, Harribel's Range increases granting her new Mid Range capabilities whilst increasing her Power.

awakened.name: Drift
awakened.description: Harribel charges towards her target at an immense speed; Harribel's Signature Move doesn't have any offensive capabilities, and is purely for movement, however it can lead to surprising opportunities for combos.

awakened.name: La Gota
awakened.description: A blast of water that is fired from Tiburon's fin blade, setting it ablaze, which is fired out like a bullet towards Tier's opponent. Increases the Aura Gauge when it hits.

awakened.name: I'll Show You
awakened.description: A series of 3 slashes comprising of an uppercut, downslash and a wide slash from left to right. Increases the Aura Gauge when it hits.

trivia: Harribel's artwork pose is a reference to her appearance in Chapter 315: `March of the Death`.

Oddly, Harribel is the only censored character in BLEACH - Rebirth of Souls; whereas characters like Soi-Fon and Yoruichi Shihōin have their Manga uncensored outfits, Harribel uses her Anime censored outfit.

toshiro-hitsugaya.name: Tōshirō Hitsugaya
toshiro-hitsugaya.quote: We are not gods. We're just Shinigami. The moment you started thinking you were a God was the moment you stopped improving.
toshiro-hitsugaya.description: The young prodigy Captain of Squad 10, wielding the strongest ice-type Zanpakutō. Despite his age, Tōshirō's tactical brilliance and dedication to duty have earned him respect among the Gotei 13. Tōshiro is a Hybrid Range fighter who utilizes both Melee and 'Tenso Jyurin' Gauge-based abilities. Keeping the offensive on your opponents whilst avoiding being hit by attacks allow him to make the most of his 'Tenso Jyurin' Gauge. With high Power and Range, moderate Defense and Technique, but lower Speed, Tōshiro can dominate the battlefield through his Balanced playstyle and Charge attacks, using careful positioning and resource management to send his foes to an icy grave.

base.name: Unique Mechanic: Tenso Jyurin Gauge
base.description: Tōshiro has access to the `Tenso Jyurin Gauge`, which has three Levels. As Tōshiro lands hits, and lands his Signature Move, Spiritual Pressure 1 Move and Spiritual Pressure 2 Move, the `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` increases. When Tōshiro is hit, the `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` decreases. The `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` also decreases over time. As the `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` increases, Tōshiro's damage output increases.

base.name: Suihyōrin
base.description: Tōshiro weaves a zone of icicles at his opponents' feet. Holding the input increases the attack's range and damage. Increases the `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` when it hits.

base.name: Soten Hyogeki
base.description: Tōshiro summons an icicle that drops on the opponent regardless of distance. If Soten Hyogeki hits, Tōshiro can exploit his opponent with a follow-up attack. Increases the `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` when it hits.

base.name: Hyoryu Renbu
base.description: Hyōrinmaru roars, as Tōshiro forms a large dragon head that trails ice behind it, firing it at the opponent over a long distance, allowing Tōshiro to launch a follow-up attack. Increases the `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` when it hits.

awakened.name: Unique Mechanic: Tenso Jyurin Gauge
awakened.description: Tōshiro has access to the `Tenso Jyurin Gauge`, which has three Levels. As Tōshiro lands hits, and lands his Signature Move, Spiritual Pressure 1 Move and Spiritual Pressure 2 Move, the `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` increases. When Tōshiro is hit, the `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` decreases. The `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` also decreases over time. As the `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` increases, Tōshiro's damage output increases.

awakened.name: Bankai: `Daiguren Hyōrinmaru` Awakening
awakened.description: Tōshiro raises Hyōrinmaru to the heavens, activating his Bankai and cladding himself in frosted ice wings that descend down his spine into a dragon's tail. When Awakened, Tōshiro's abilities are enhanced, and the limit of his `Tenso Jyurin Gauge` increases considerably.

kikon.name: Hyoryu Hato
kikon.description: Whilst Unawakened, Tōshiro leaps into the air, spawning a colossal, spiralling serpent with the head of a dragon, launching it towards his opponent, causing a field of ice crystals to form at the epicentre.

kikon.name: Hyoten Hyakkaso
kikon.description: Whislt Awakened, Tōshiro slices his opponent before holding Hyōrinmaru to the heavens, opening the clouds for snowfall. As the snow lands and comes into contact with his opponent, dramatic flowers of ice form, coating the opponent in a bouquet of flowers towering towards the gap in the heavens, before shattering.

kikon.name: Ryūsenka
kikon.description: Whilst Awakened, Tōshiro dashes towards his opponent with a stab prepared for his opponents' chest, launching them before following up with a second, more powerful stab that erupts a crucifix of ice from their body, marking their grave.

ulquiorra-shifar.name: Ulquiorra Shifar
ulquiorra-shifar.description: The Cuatro Espada and the Aspect of Nihility; ruthless and unfeeling, Ulquiorra stands as Aizen's last bastion of Las Noches, guarding the captive Orihime Inoue. A sign of one of Ulquiorra's victims is the hole punched through his opponents' chest; a grim reflection of his own emptiness. Ulquiorra is a Hybrid Range fighter combining Fast Melee attacks with devastating Ranged abilities. His Balanced playstyle and unique Vampiric mechanics allow him to not only shed his Reishi to ehance his attacks, but also allows him to regenerate his Reishi over time. With excellent Speed and Range, moderate Power, but lower Defense and Technique, Ulquiorra excels at swift, precise strikes while maintaining pressure through his energy-based attacks; additionally, Ulquiorra is one of few characters in the game with access to a Reawakening, further exceeding his already high limits through the power of Segunda Etapa.

base.name: Unique Mechanic: Vampirism
base.description: Ulquiorra has a unique Archetype that allows him to shed his Reiatsu during his Signature Move, and to recover Reiatsu with his Spiritual Pressure Move 2. It is unknown if Ulquiorra can reduce his Reiatsu below 1 at this point, or if Ulquiorra's Signature Move can be used at 1 Reiatsu.

base.name: Cero
base.description: Fires a green laser of Reiryoku towards Ulquiorra's opponent. It consumes a portion of Ulquiorra's Reishi in exchange for high damage.

base.name: Instant Regeneration
base.description: Ulquiorra assumes a pose and swirls green Reishi around him, healing a portion of his Reishi over time. Holding down the input and charging Instant Regeneration increases the speed of Ulquiorra' Reishi recovery.

base.name: Alternate Cero
base.description: Ulquiorra consumes a portion of his Reishi in order to fire a more powerful 'Cero', but it consumes more Reishi than his Signature Move counterpart. 'Alternate Cero' can be chained on the end of 'Cero' to deal devastating ranged damage at the cost of a lot of Reishi.

awakened.name: Unique Mechanic: Vampirism
awakened.description: Ulquiorra has a unique Archetype that allows him to shed his Reiatsu during his Signature Move, and to recover Reiatsu with his Spiritual Pressure Move 2. It is unknown if Ulquiorra can reduce his Reiatsu below 1 at this point, or if Ulquiorra's Signature Move can be used at 1 Reiatsu.

awakened.name: Ressurección: `Murciélago` Awakening
awakened.description: Ulquiorra swells with power as he points Murciélago at his foe, exploding with Reiryoku and raining down blackened green Reiryoku on the surrounding area. Two jet-black wings sprout from Ulquiorra's back, as his Hollow Mask now mirrors itself to form a fuller form. Whilst Awakened, the amount of Reiatsu he can hold is drastically increased, making it easier to use his Spiritual Pressure moves.

awakened.name: Cero
awakened.description: Fires a green laser of Reiryoku towards Ulquiorra's opponent. It consumes a portion of Ulquiorra's Reishi in exchange for high damage.

awakened.name: Instant Regeneration
awakened.description: Ulquiorra assumes a pose and swirls green Reishi around him, healing a portion of his Reishi over time. Holding down the input and charging Instant Regeneration increases the speed of Ulquiorra' Reishi recovery.

awakened.name: Cero Oscuras
awakened.description: Ulquiorra consumes a portion of his Reishi in order to fire a more powerful 'Cero', but it consumes more Reishi than his Signature Move counterpart. 'Cero Oscuras' can be chained on the end of 'Cero' to deal devastating ranged damage at the cost of a lot of Reishi.

reawakened.name: Unique Mechanic: Vampirism
reawakened.description: Ulquiorra has a unique Archetype that allows him to shed his Reiatsu during his Signature Move, and to recover Reiatsu with his Spiritual Pressure Move 2. It is unknown if Ulquiorra can reduce his Reiatsu below 1 at this point, or if Ulquiorra's Signature Move can be used at 1 Reiatsu.

reawakened.name: Segunda Etapa Reawakening
reawakened.description: Emerging from a storm of nothingness, Ulquiorra showcases his perfected form, the Segunda Etapa release. In this form, he becomes fully bat-like, shedding his Hollow Mask, and is clad in a thick, blackened fur, sprouting sharp nails on his hands and feet, and a long, windy tail at his rear. When Reawakened, all of Ulquiorra's attacks change, and his Power and Speed drastically increase.

kikon.name: Cero of Pity
kikon.description: Whilst Unawakened, Ulquiorra stabs a single time with absolute precision before holding out his hand, firing a single, powerful Cero.

kikon.name: Cero Oscuras
kikon.description: Whilst Awakened, Ulquiorra stabs his opponent's waist with a javelin a single time before firing a Cero Oscuras straight at his opponent.

kikon.name: Fulgore
kikon.description: Whilst Awakened, Ulquiorra slashes his opponent's waist a single time, before wrapping himself in his jet black wings, spinning into a throwing stance where he looses a javelin of extremely explosive Reiryoku straight at his opponent.

kikon.name: Segunda Etapa: Latigo Cero Oscuras
kikon.description: Whilst Reawakened, Ulquiorra sends his opponent flying catching them with his whip-like tail, hanging them  above him whilst he fires a point-blank Cero Oscuras through the center of his opponent's chest.

kikon.name: Segunda Etapa: Lanza del Relámpago
kikon.description: Whilst Reawakened, Ulquiorra clasps his hands together to weave a long javelin of immense explosive Reiryoku, gripping it and firing it straight towards his opponent to cause an astoundingly powerful blast.

uryu-ishida.name: Uryū Ishida
uryu-ishida.quote: The man's name was Sôken Ishida. He was my teacher... And my Grandfather. I'm glad Orihime isn't here. I wouldn't want her to see this... On my honor as a Quincy... I'm going... To kill you.
uryu-ishida.description: A young man from Karakura Town that claims to be 'The Last Quincy'. He encounters Ichigo Kurosaki after taunting him into a Hollow-slaying contest that quickly escalates. The echoes of his race's past linger in his mind, and forces Uryū to face extreme adversity. Uryū is a Long Range character that makes use of a wide variety of Ranged attacks. He has a Balanced playstyle, and is one of few characters in the game who has a Reawakening. Be wary of Uryū's miniscular Defense, Speed and Power - It's best to avoid attacks and to pick at opponents from a range, making use of Uryū's various techniques to overpower your enemies.

abilities.abilityName: And the victor of this battle is me
abilities.abilityQuote: The right to choose life or death lies with the victor

base.name: Licht Regen
base.description: Uryu fires a rain of arrows into the air and looses them upon his target. By holding the input, the arrow storm fired will last longer.

base.name: Quincy Arrow
base.description: Fires a Heilig Pfiel towards Uryu's opponent. If the arrow hits, Uryu uses Hirenkyaku to teleport towards the opponent, firing a successive barrage of 5 additional Heilig Pfiel arrows.

base.name: Seeleschneider
base.description: Uryu draws his Seeleschneider, holding it in-front of him. If an opponent hits Uryu, he absorbs the hit and counters with a powerful retaliation, followed by a precise Heilig Pfiel.

awakened.name: Ransōtengai Awakening
awakened.description: Uryu manipulates his body through threads of Reiryoku, enhancing his damage output and increasing the amount of Reiatsu he can store.

reawakened.name: Letzt Stile Reawakening
reawakened.description: Uryu snaps one of the prongs of his Sanrei Glove, breaking his commitment to his Grandfather and instilling within him the true power of `The Last Quincy`. Uryu's outfit changes, and his mastery over Reishi is exponentially enhanced. It is currently not known exactly what this Reawakening does to Uryu in regards to gameplay.

kikon.name: Heilig Pfeil
kikon.description: Whilst Unawakened, Uryu draws his bowstring, charging a powerful Heilig Pfeil before loosing it upon his foe in a powerful, precise blast.

kikon.description: Awakened Kikon currently not known.

kikon.name: Unknown
kikon.description: Alternate Awakened Kikon currently not known.

kikon.name: Letzt Stile: Heilig Pfeil
kikon.description: Whilst Reawakened, Uryu summons a Heilig Pfeil from the surrounding Reishi, notching it on his bow, firing an explosive blast truly worthy of one known as 'The Last Quincy'.

kikon.name: Unknown
kikon.description: Alternate Reawakened Kikon currently not known.

yasutora-chad-sado.name: Yasutora 'Chad' Sado
yasutora-chad-sado.description: A gentle giant of Mexican-Japanese descent and one of Ichigo's closest friends. Chad's tremendous physical strength is matched only by his loyalty, following a promise made to his Abuelo to use his power to protect others rather than for personal gain. Chad is a Short Range fighter who excels in Melee combat with a Slow but powerful Berserker playstyle. His Charge attacks allow him to power through enemy defenses with explosive force while maintaining offensive pressure. With outstanding Power and Defense, decent Speed, but low Range and Technique, Chad is a tank who can take hits while dealing massive damage up close. I can't imagine him losing.

base.name: Agresión
base.description: An explosive laser attack that can be charged, and held at full-charge whislt Chad moves. The more that Agresión is charged, the more powerful it becomes. Additionally, the closer the opponent is to Chad when firing Agresión, the more damage it deals. The boosts from Agresión's charge level and the opponent's distance stack.

base.name: Alerta
base.description: Chad regulates his breathing and glows with a blue flame, buffing the charge speed of Agresión for a period of time.

base.name: Contraataque
base.description: An uppercut that can catch an opponents' attack if Chad is hit by an attack during Contraataque's animation, which if successfully done drastically boosts Contraatque's strength.

awakened.name: `Brazo Derecha de Gigante y Brazo Izquierda Del Diablo` Awakening
awakened.description: Chad calls forth the power of his demonic left arm, Brazo Izquierda Del Diablo, wrapping it in a Hollow-white armor as the shield on his right arm grows larger; when Awakened, Chad's offensive capabilities are enhanced as he now mixes both of his arms into his attacks.

yoruichi-shihoin.name: Yoruichi Shihōin
yoruichi-shihoin.quote: Were you afraid? That's your problem. You're focusing too much on what's to come.
yoruichi-shihoin.description: Former Captain of Squad 2 and ex-commander of the Stealth Force, Yoruichi is known as the 'Flash Goddess' for her unmatched speed. Despite her noble heritage, she chose exile to help her childhood friend, Kisuke Urahara. Yoruichi is a Short Range fighter specializing in Fast Melee combat and Kidō techniques. Her Rushdown playstyle makes her a relentless and swift attacker who can quickly overwhelm opponents with her light but rapid strikes. Boasting extreme Speed and high Technique, with decent Range, but lower Power and Defense, Yoruichi excels at poking tactics and creating offensive pressure through dominating combos that leave little room to breathe or escape.

base.name: Anken & Flash Breaker
base.description: A two-stage move that fires one of two moves, depending on how long the user holds the input. The first-stage attack fires two small Anken knives at the opponent. The second-stage attack acts as a counter; if the opponent hits Yoruichi with an attack in this state, Yoruichi counters, dodges the attack and retaliates.

base.name: Bakko
base.description: A long-distance rush that launches a devastating punch to the opponent's gut, before following up with an explosive Reiryoku bomb.

base.name: Oboro Neko
base.description: Yoruichi takes a lowered, hunched appearance flashing with afterimages. If Yoruichi is attacked, she avoids the attack and retaliates with a barrage of 10 melee strikes, finishing with a powerful downwards stomp.

awakened.name: Shunkō Awakening
awakened.description: Yoruichi outstretches her arm, wrapping Kidō into a pair of electrical flurries that stem from her back like wings before the sheer force blows her outfit down to a basic bodysuit due to the force. When Awakened, Yoruichi's Speed and Power are drastically increased, making her one of the fastest characters in the game.

kikon.name: Unknown
kikon.description: Base Kikon currently not known.

kikon.name: Mujin Senda
kikon.description: Whilst Awakened, Yoruichi kicks her opponent, preparing to display her mastery of Hakuda and Kidō by striking the opponent with 10 precise, electrified punches in the span of 2 seconds.

kikon.name: Shunrai
kikon.description: Whilst Awakened, Yoruichi lands on the ground, raising her arm towards he foe, palm outstretched as electrified Reiryoku collates at the centre of her hand, buzzing and vibrating with kinetic energy as Yoruichi unleashes it, firing an amazingly powerful blast of electrical energy.
